match_script_agent.name: match_script_agent
match_script_agent.label: Match Script Generator
match_script_agent.description: Football match analyst and viral video script writer that analyzes matches from any league worldwide and generates engaging, hype-style short video scripts with trending social media reactions, hashtags, and viral hooks.

african_spotlight_agent.name: african_spotlight_agent
african_spotlight_agent.label: African Football Spotlight
african_spotlight_agent.description: African football content specialist with Kenyan focus that creates dedicated content highlighting African players across global leagues with special emphasis on Kenyan football talent, stories, and achievements.

trending_content_agent.name: trending_content_agent
trending_content_agent.label: Trending Content Curator
trending_content_agent.description: Football trending topics curator and viral content strategist that monitors and curates trending football topics, memes, debates, and viral moments across social media, generating ready-to-publish content packages.
